pages.text: Qorses are a cross between a Horse and a Quagga. $(br2)They can come in any base coat and marking that a horse can, while also sporting the classic Quagga markings.

Qorses act similarly to Quaggas, but aren't as frightened by humans, and can wear armor. $(br2)They cannot be found naturally and cannot produce offspring, much like a mule. $(br2)Qorses enjoy the same foods as horses.
